title: Social Media Operations Specialist
tagsAndSkills: Digital Marketing,Communication Skills,Journalism,Social Media Marketing,Content Writing,Advertising,Media,Digital

ambitionBoxData.Title: Boneng Transmission India Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Role & responsibilities


1. Responsible for LinkedIn/Facebook/sets/Twitter and other social media daily content planning, production and release, as well as routine maintenance of accounts; Respond to fan messages and comments and stay engaged with your fans.

2. Formulate social media promotion strategies according to brand positioning and target audience, and attract audience's attention and participation through the release of attractive content, interactive activities and advertising.

3. Responsible for the network publicity of the company's exhibitions and other offline activities.

4. Cooperate with other departments of the company to carry out content promotion and publicity to improve brand exposure.

5. Regularly analyze and make statistics on the company's social media accounts.

6. Collected marketing promotion information, investigated and analyzed the marketing content trends of the industry and competitors.



Preferred candidate profile

1. Good English communication skills, journalism, communication, advertising, marketing and other related majors preferred;

2. Background in manufacturing company or media content creation related work experience is preferred;

3. Proficient in the use of social media software, familiar with the rules and operation methods of social media platforms, more than one year of relevant operation experience is preferred;

4. Have strong copywriting ability and good visual aesthetic ability, able to shoot or make photos and videos;

5. Have good communication skills and team spirit, and can effectively communicate and cooperate with the company inside and outside.



Perks and benefits

title: PNG Marketing( Only Sales & Marekting Person )
tagsAndSkills: Sales And Marketing,FMCG Marketing,Automotive Sales,LPG,Oil,Tyres,Lubricants,Consumer Durables
jobDescription:
To give thrust to Marketing and other allied activities in CNG/PNG realizing increased sales volumes for the Company.

Develop market strategy for acquisition, retention and management of Industrial & Bulk Commercial (I&C) customers in order to achieve desired target.

Functional Competencies

Essential functional competencies required


In case of Fresher

Should be inclined towards a career in sales

Should have excellent communication skills

Proficiency in Excel, analytical skills, sales skills

In case of experienced

Prior Sales or Product Management experience having preferably handled Channel sales / Retail network management / Industrial sales.

Preferred industries - Oil & Gas / Consumer Durables / Consumer Non-Durables / FMCG/ Automotive / Tyres / Lubricants / Paints or similar industries.

Excellent Presentation and Communication skill with analytical approach

Conceptually sound knowledge about Marketing and Sales concepts and models.

Desired functional competencies required


Essential

Customer centricity

Problem solving skills and Influencing.

Ability to analyse any problem and suggest discrete, logical problem-solving steps.

Willingness to travel, work out of office environment.

Desirable

Knowledge of Gas industry

Fluent in English

Prior experience of interaction with statutory authorities / Government bodies.

Behavioural Competencies

Behavioural competencies


Committed to Target achievement.

Ability to handle extreme work peaks / pressure situations.

Relationship management

Must be committed, go getter and enthusiastic.

Must be a strong team player.

Experience & Educational Requirements

Educational Qualification

Include Additional Certification if any


Full Time Bachelors Degree in any discipline is essential.

MBA Marketing or PGDM-Marketing is optional but will be given preference.

Relevant Experience


Fresher or at least 1 year of experience

Relevant experience Must have spent significant part of career in Sales or Product Management.

Communication Interfaces

External

Interaction with channel partners, dealers, operators, MPCB Regional & HO

CNG Kit Distributors, Franchisee

Direct marketing agencies for PNG & CNG, Downstream Contractors, Burner Manufacturers, Chief Fire Officer of MIDC(s) and Auditors and other vendor related to marketing activities

Builders, Developers, Institutions, OEMs, Industrial and commercial associations etc.

Government departments/ statutory bodies


Internal

R&T and Finance

Marketing team including CRM, Corporate Communications

Projects, O&M and E & P

Legal



Key responsibilities & Accountabilities


ACHIEVING BUDGETED REGISTRATION TARGETS AND GAS VOLUME TARGETS by :

a) Conducting detailed survey and derive detailed understanding of Domestic potential in target markets.

b) Developing strong relationship with key stake holders such as Institutions, leading builders for PNG network expansion.

c) Planning suitable field activities (through Direct Marketing agencies, sales representatives) for achieving the PNG registration target ensuring highest level penetration in a given area

d) Keeping continuous check and vigil on the Direct Marketing agencies and sales representatives to ensure that work is being carried out as per plan.

e) Providing continuous training and value addition to the Direct Marketing agencies & sales representatives in order to optimize results.

f) Maximizing collections from customers through Collection agencies in assigned market thereby ensuring minimum overdue outstandings at any given point of time

g) Timely resolving customer marketing queries / complaints, ensuring correctness of the database with respect to Customer Masters, maintaining the ISO related documents and MIS of allotted areas/zone.

h) Closely coordinating with direct marketing agencies, project & planning dept. for providing PNG connection in a committed timeline.

i) Implementing promotional plan / marketing scheme for enhancing penetration in gas supplied areas
